Class ReflectionHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.kkorolyov.sqlob.util.ReflectionHelper

  • public class ReflectionHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides static utility methods for dealing with reflection operations.

        Returns:
        new T
        Throws:

      • verifyType

        public static void verifyType​(java.lang.reflect.Field f,
                              java.lang.Class<?> c)
        Verifies that f's type is a subclass of c.
        Parameters:
        f - field to verify
        c - expected field type
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if f's type is not assignable from c

      • getGenericParameters

        public static java.lang.Class[] getGenericParameters​(java.lang.reflect.Field f)
        Parameters:
        f - field to get generic parameters from
        Returns:
        generic parameters of f's type as Classes, with non-Class parameters replaced with null
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if f's type is not parameterized
